30 Watt.description: The 30 Watt laser is perfect for engraving and cutting thin materials like paper and fabric. It offers high precision and is ideal for small-scale projects.

40 Watt.description: The 40 Watt laser provides a balance between power and presicion making it suitable for a wider range of materials including wood and acrilic up to 1/4 inch thick.

50 Watt.description: The 50 Watt laser is a versatile option that can handle a variety of materilas including wood, acriylic and leather up to 1/2 inch thick. It is suitable for both engraving and cutting tasks.

60 Watt.description: The 60 Watt laser is a powerful choice for cuttinf and engraving thicker materials such as wood and acrylic up to 3/4 inch thick with ease. It is ideal for more demanding projects that require deeper cuts and faster processing times.

80 Watt.description: The 80 Watt laser is a high power option capable of handling a wide range of materials including thicker wood, acrylic and leather up to 1 inch thick. It is suitable for both intricate engraving and heavy-duty cutting tasks.

75 Watt.description: The 75 Watt laser is a high power option capable of handling a wide range of materials including thicker wood, acrylic and leather up to 1 inch thick. It is suitable for both intricate ebgraving and heavy-duty cutting tasks.

120 Watt.description: The 120 Watt laser is an extremely powerful machine capable of cutting and engraving a wide variety of materials including thick wood and metal up to 2 inches thick. It is designed for industrial applications and large-scale projects that require maximum power and efficiency.

20 Watt.description: The 20 Watt fiber laser is ideal for marking and engraving metals and plastics. It offers high precision and is perfect for small-scale industrial applications.

30 Watt.description: The 30 Watt fiber laser is a versatile machine suitable for marking, engraving and annealing a variety of metals and plastics. It provides a good balance between power and presicion for medium-scale industrial applications.

50 Watt.description: The 50 Watt fiber laser is a high power machine designed for heavy-duty marking, engraving and annealing tasks on a wide range of metals and plastics. It is ideal for large-scale industrial applications that require maximum power and efficiency.

30 Watt.description: The 30 Watt fusion maker laser is a versatile machine suitable for engraving and cutting a variety of materials including wood and acrylic up to 1/8 inch. It is ideal for hobbyists and small-scale projects that require precision and detail.

40 Watt.description: The 40 Watt fusion maker laser offers increased power for cutting and engraving a wider range of materials including wood, acrylic and leather up to 1/4 inch thick. It is suitable for more detailed projects that require higher precision and speed.

50 Watt.description: The 50 Watt fusion maker laser is a high power option capable of handling a wide range of materials including thicker wood, acrylic and leather up to 1/2 inch thick. It is sutable for both intricate engraving and heavy-duty cutting tasks.
